xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Diagrams showing project module imports. Generated with `mermaid.js`.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Andy Bunce, Quodatum, License: Apache-2.0

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: generate html page containing import imports diagram using mermaid.js

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:html

xqdoc:annotation.name: xqdoca:global
xqdoc:annotation.xqdoc:literal: Project wide module imports as html mermaid class diagram

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:html ( $model as map(*), $opts as map(*) ) { let $mermaid:=_:mmd( $model, $opts) let $related:= page:related-buttons("global","mermaid", $opts) return _:page-wrap($mermaid,$related,$opts) }

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: generate text for mermaid class diagram in mmd format

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:mmd

xqdoc:annotation.name: xqdoca:global
xqdoc:annotation.xqdoc:literal: Project wide module imports as a mermaid class diagram

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature:
function _:mmd ( $model as map(*), $opts as map(*) ) as xs:string { let $files:=$model?files (: just files with prefix ie xqm :) let $files:= $files!_:class-name(.,position(),$files) let $classes:= $files!_:class(.) let $links:= $files!``[link `{ .?mermaid }` "`{ .?href }`index.html" "This is a tooltip for `{ .?namespace }`" ]`` let $imports:=for $f in $files, $i in xqd:where-imported($files, $f?namespace) return ``[`{ $i?mermaid}` ..>`{ $f?mermaid}` ]`` let $actors:=``[ class RESTXQ:::cssrest class INVOKE:::cssmain class TEST:::cssunit ]`` let $classDefs:=``[ classDef cssrest fill:palegreen classDef cssmain fill:powderblue classDef cssunit fill:yellow ]`` return``[%%{init: {'securityLevel': 'loose', 'theme':'base'}}%% classDiagram direction TB `{ $actors }` `{ $classes }` `{ $imports }` `{ $classDefs }` `{ $links }` ]``=>replace('
', '
') }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:class
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:class ( $file as map(*) ) as xs:string { let $name:=$file?mermaid let $ns:= $file?namespaces let $functions:= $file?xqdoc//xqdoc:function let $restfns:=$functions[ xqdoc:annotations/xqdoc:annotation =>filter(xqa:is-rest(?,"path",$ns)) ] let $fns:=$restfns/xqdoc:name=>_:class-fns-list() let $testfns:=$functions[ xqdoc:annotations/xqdoc:annotation =>filter(xqa:is-unit(?,"test",$ns)) ] let $is-main:= $file?xqdoc/xqdoc:module/@type eq "main" let $vars:=$file?xqdoc //xqdoc:variable/xqdoc:name => _:class-vars-list() return if($restfns) then ``[class `{ $name }`:::cssrest { << Rest `{$file?path }`>> `{ $fns }`} RESTXQ..>`{ $name }` ]`` else if($is-main) then ``[class `{ $name }`:::cssmain{ << `{ $file?path }` >> `{ $vars }`} INVOKE..>`{ $name }` ]`` else if (exists($testfns)) then ``[class `{ $name }`:::cssunit{ << `{ $file?path }` >>} TEST..>`{ $name }` ]`` else ``[class `{ $name }` { << `{ tokenize($file?path,"/")[last()] }` >>} ]`` }

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: add "mermaid" key to $file map value unique label

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:class-name
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:class-name ( $file as map(*), $pos as xs:integer, $files as map(*)* ) as map(*) { let $fn:=function($file){if($file?prefix)then $file?prefix else "local"} let $name:=$fn($file) let $count:=subsequence($files,1,$pos -1)!$fn(.)[. eq $name]=>count() let $name:= translate($name,"-","_") || (if($count gt 0) then "Δ" ||1+ $count) return (map:entry("mermaid", $name),$file) =>map:merge() }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:class-fns-list
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:class-fns-list ( $names as xs:string* ) as xs:string { let $r:=$names!substring-after(.,":") !concat(.,"()") =>sort() =>string-join(file:line-separator()) return concat(file:line-separator(),$r,file:line-separator()) }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:class-vars-list
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:class-vars-list ( $names as xs:string* ) as xs:string { let $r:=$names =>sort() =>string-join(file:line-separator()) return concat(file:line-separator(),$r,file:line-separator()) }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:page-wrap
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature:
function _:page-wrap ( $mermaid as xs:string+,$related,$opts as map(*) ) as element(html) { {_:head("Module imports diagram","resources/")}
{$opts?project} - Module dependancy diagram {$related}
{ $mermaid }
}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:head
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:head ( $title as xs:string,$resources as xs:string ) as element(head) { <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no"/> <meta http-equiv="Generator" content="xqdoca - https://github.com/quodatum/xqdoca" /> <title>{ $title } - xqDocA</title> <link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/x-icon" href="{ $resources }xqdoc.png" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources || $page:prism }prism.css"/> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources }page.css" /> <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources }query.css" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources }base.css" /> --> </head> }
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function _:head($title as xs:string,$resources as xs:string) as element(head){ <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no"/> <meta http-equiv="Generator" content="xqdoca - https://github.com/quodatum/xqdoca" /> <title>{ $title } - xqDocA</title>
<link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/x-icon" href="{ $resources }xqdoc.png" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources || $page:prism }prism.css"/> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources }page.css" /> <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources }query.css" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="{ $resources }base.css" /> --> </head> }
